text:
—=———. The special video messages of celebrities

"I hope that people look upon charity as they look upon the necessity of flowers needing
oxygen. Any dream is possible if it comes from the heart because it is a real thing"

- Stevie Wonder

“I hope to have the opportunity to bring our own modest contributions one day together
with you because we are the world”
- Quincy Jones
"I dream that, one day when I wake up, the whole world will be one people who loves
each other. I think it is possible that people throughout the world will communicate with
each other since we are not different"
- George Duke

“I am pleased to learn that all your work is to achieve peace of help, peace of mind,
peace of heart and peace of body”’
- Dionne Warwick

“Remember, you can achieve everything if you really try. Never, never, never give in”

y - Former Los Angeles Mayor Tom Bradley

HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_031382
